name: Lovely Weather We're Having
description: Goal-free explorer that responds to ur local weather. What are u gonna do? Run around with ur dog. Interact with kooky NPCs. Jump off a roof. Kick a rock. Run thru flowers. Be outside! Ok!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP+ Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz. Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600, Intel HD 3000+.

reviews.review_text: This game changes insignificant things about a small isometric world based on your local weather readings. Maybe if you're uncontrollably curious about extremely minor aesthetic details, you'll love this game. Every time you boot this game up will feel like Christmas morning.   For the rest of us, you could get a better experience by just going outside and talking to your weird neighbor in real life.

I think most of the negative reviews are a little over the top and maybe went in with the wrong mindset for this game. If you're looking for a game with goals that's meant to be played for hours on end, then this isn't the game for you, no. However, if you enjoy chill games, short bursts of play (such as the recommended 10-20 mins) or have a tumblr, you'll probably like this game. It honestly just reminds me of amateur art but I mean that in the best way.
Yep. Yeah. No I liked it. I really did. It's a stress reliever for sure. Alright. Till next time. Bye.
This game is like a weird, rubbery mash of Animal Crossing and Miffy. It's bizarre, it's colorful, it's quiet.
